subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This plugin handles citizen-oriented ideation on the web.

ul.li: A step-by-step form to submit a proposal
A SOLR-based search page with thumbnails
For each proposal, a sheet with all informations

p.strong: The OpenPB demo site uses this plugin, so you can see it in action !

subsection.p: Please keep in mind that this plugin :

ul.li: is in alpha version and is under development ; some features could not work properly :-/
currently needs plugin-participatorybudget plugin to work (in medium term, the plugin will be independant, and may be connected to other plugins using mediator modules)
